name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up
Nanning Metro requires all employees to fill out the "Personal We-media Account Summary Form" to check for risks.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens submit "The Last Lesson"
Tibetan and Uyghur netizens miss their mother tongue which is about to disappear

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: NAn eyewitness said that the attacker who attacked the school bus of the Jiangsu Japanese School was a man in his 50s or 60s. He grabbed a boy and waved a knife. Then the crew, parents and other people around him used umbrellas and bags to subdue him. After being subdued, he still made noise for a while.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 24, Hefei. A student in the second canteen of the Longhe Campus of Anhui University held a portrait of Chairman Mao and shouted slogans such as "Long live Chairman Mao, long live the proletariat" and walked around the canteen.
A staff member tried to snatch the portrait, but was stopped by another man. The student immediately protected the portrait in front of his chest and shouted "Communist Party, why are you insulting Chairman Mao!"
The student was then taken away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The scene of the Suzhou Japanese school bus attack
The subdued murderer and the stabbed crew member

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Suzhou Japanese school bus attack was once again identified as an isolated incident.
On June 25, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs stated that the police initially determined that this was an isolated incident. China is one of the safest countries in the world and we always welcome foreigners to come to China.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 25, all Changyun bus lines in Laiwu District, Jinan City and all bus lines in Gangcheng District were announced to be temporarily suspended.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/44Xi7regSD

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 23, Chaozhou, Guangdong. A man stabbed a man sitting on the roadside with a knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 24, Chuxiong, Yunnan. After a man in Yuanmou County was knocked down by urban management officers, several urban management officers came forward and punched and kicked him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 24, in Meizhou, Guangdong, at about 10:10 a.m., a white car suddenly started and knocked down a woman riding an electric bike, then reversed and hit her again. The video shows that there was a child on the electric bike.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Since June 24, developers have received notifications from OpenAl, stating that additional measures will be taken from July 9 to stop using APIs from countries and regions not supported by OpenAl. 
Currently unsupported countries include China, Cuba, Iran, North Korea, Syria, Russia, Venezuela, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 20, a woman from Xiamen Donghai Vocational and Technical College posted a video saying that she bought two meals at school and took six pairs of disposable chopsticks, and was accused of stealing by the canteen staff.
On the 24th, the girl in question distributed 10,000 pairs of disposable chopsticks for free outside the canteen, attracting many students to come and receive them for free.
The Education Bureau said it is guiding the school to handle the matter properly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 25, it was reported that Zhu Min, former governor of the People's Bank of China, said at the Summer Davos Forum that China has entered the ranks of high-income countries and that Chinese people have "six wallets" to spend money on their children. This triggered a lot of ridicule from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/xYDmCDN9kQ

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Gangcheng bus driver said: Only January’s salary was paid this year, and the employees’ pension insurance has not been paid from January 2022 to the present.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
People on TikTok are starting to "pray for green" again

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 25, the Wall Street Journal reported that US Ambassador to China Burns accused the Chinese government of inconsistency in words and deeds and inciting anti-US sentiment in the country. He said that the US Embassy in China has held 61 public events since November last year, including mental health lectures, women's entrepreneurship seminars and cultural performances. However, the Chinese government has put pressure on Chinese citizens to prevent them from participating or tried to intimidate participants. Some participants have also been

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the comment section related to the attack on the school bus of a Japanese school in Suzhou, a large number of netizens expressed their support for the attackers, saying "well done" and "a hot-blooded man", and some even questioned whether the incident was directed and acted by the Japanese themselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Someone distributed leaflets in May Fourth Square in Qingdao, calling on the governor and the provincial party secretary to pay attention to the unjust, false and wrong case of "Sui Yongzhang".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 24, Beijing. On Line 10, an old man asked a woman to give up her seat for him. After the woman refused, the old man used his walking stick to pull the inside of the woman's legs. On the 25th, the official announcement stated that the old man involved was administratively detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 25, Premier Li Qiang said the Chinese government was drawing on traditional Chinese medicine theories to "regulate" the Chinese economy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The theory of "strengthening the foundation and nourishing the roots" was first proposed in Li Qiang's government work report on March 5.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 24-25, Dongguan, Guangdong. Taigongling Village recently started charging parking fees, which caused dissatisfaction among truck drivers living here.
Truck drivers parked their trucks at the toll gate to block the road in protest, and some drivers were forcibly carried away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 24, Xinhua News Agency reported that 40 small and medium-sized rural banks had been absorbed, merged or dissolved in the past seven days, and the trend of decreasing number of small and medium-sized rural banks will not change in the future.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the famous Shangyuan Art Museum in Beijing was demolished because it was identified as an illegal building by the government.
On the 14th, Shangyuan Art Museum launched the "Art is Dead" event, inviting people to come to the ruins of the demolished art museum to create and mourn.
At the same time, the art museum believes that the government originally funded the transformation of the garbage dump outside the art museum into an art gallery and also built a bus stop. If it was an illegal building, why did the government support it?
